com.yantra.api.omp.order

Interface changeOrderStatus

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface changeOrderStatus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document changeOrderStatus(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The changeOrderStatus API changes the status of an order based on the TransactionId and BaseDropStatus passed.

    • Method Detail

      • changeOrderStatus

        org.w3c.dom.Document changeOrderStatus(YFSEnvironment env,
                                       org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                       java.rmi.RemoteException

        The changeOrderStatus API changes the status of an order based on the TransactionId and BaseDropStatus passed. If no TransactionID is passed, the BaseDropStatus is used to set the new status. This api cannnot be used to backorder or cancel an order.

        Order Line Reservations

        When the status of a line changes, negative Order Line Reservations (made to compensate for double demand) will be reevaluated for the line. For more information on negative Order Line Reservations, refer to the changeOrder API.
        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:

          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetTagNoUE

        Events Raised:
        Events must be set up for the transaction calling this API.
        ON_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS_CHANGE:

          This event is raised when an order release status is changed for the order.
          Data published - YFS_ORDER_CHANGE.ON_ORDER_RELEASE_STATUS_CHANGE.xml
          Key data - modifyOrder_dbd.txt

          Template Support:
          Yes.
          ON_STATUS_CHANGE:

            Data publish - CHANGE_ORDER_STATUS.ON_STATUS_CHANGE.xml - The input xml is also appended to the root node of the output xml.
            Key data - modifyOrder_dbd.txt

          Template Support:
          Yes. Some of the elements and attributes are not template driven. Refer to input xml for element level details.

          Audits: None

          Pre-conditions: None

          Post-conditions: None

          Output Template Support:
          Yes. Some of the elements and attributes are not template driven. Refer to output xml for element level details.

          Database Extensibility Support: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by createEnvironment.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document of the OrderStatus. The input xml is appended to the root node of the output xml. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException
